data.eml:eml: A study on genus Chlamydatus Curtis, 1833 from China (Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Xiao-Ming, Liu, Guo-Qing (2006): A study on genus Chlamydatus Curtis, 1833 from China (Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae). Zootaxa 1271: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173273
